comments.content:
Paul Lloyd's [Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826113657/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd/blackjewels/index.htm).

Note that, in Windows anyway, this font appears in a program's font menu as PlainBlack rather that Black Plain.
